bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yang sheng xi rou 咽生瘜肉 , the throat grows tumorous flesh. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry shi yan 食鹽 quotes Sun zhen ren shi ji 孫真人食忌 : 主卒喉中生肉，以綿裹筯頭柱鹽 揩，日六七度易 , “To control sudden flesh growth in the throat : Swab with salt using the tips of chopsticks wrapped in silk cloth. Change six, seven times daily”. Hou zhong si wu 喉中似物 , a sensation as if there were an object in the throat [1] Pathological Condition identical with mei he ge qi 梅核膈氣， plum-pit occlusion qi. Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 Substance Entry bai rang he 白蘘荷 quotes HShF : 治喉中似物，吞吐不出，腹脹羸瘦 , “It cures a sensation as if there were an object in the throat that cannot be swallowed and cannot be thrown out. The abdomen is distended with emaciaton”.
